title: MONDAY 2/8 - Super Bowl LV recap and remembering Chris Wesseling
itunes:title: MONDAY 2/8 - Super Bowl LV recap and remembering Chris Wesseling
description:
The Tampa Bay Buccaneers and Tom Brady made Super Bowl history defeating the Kansas City Chiefs 31-9 (0:07)... Tom Brady capturing his 7th Lombardi Trophy as Tampa Bay won its second title in franchise history. Wide Receiver Mike Evans saying Brady brought the "LeBron effect" with him to Tampa (2:04). Meanwhile, Patrick Mahomes held without a touchdown pass as the Buccaneers defense caused KC problems all night (2:27). The podcast wraps with a tribute to our late NFL Media colleague Chris Wesseling, who passed away on Friday (3:31). Good Morning Football is part of the NFL Podcasts network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
